subject: ubunto and speakup
body:
Hi,

I have ubuntu 7.4 installed on a drive.

I gather that speakup is included with this version.

Just wondering how I would get speakup working with an appollo synth?


I can only find reference to using software speech with ubuntu.

Thanks
